name: BOOTY TOSS
description:
The latest BOOTY won't toss itself! Separate the GOOD booty from the BAD booty. BOOTY BAGS get tossed, BOOTY BARRELS stay put.WE GOT 15 SECS BEFORE DEPARTURE SO SPLIT 'EM UP FAST OR WE'RE PARTIN' WAYS!

Made for the #GDevelopGameJam3 with Gdevelop.

(feedback and comments are always appreciated!)

HOW TO PLAY:

  • Click "BOOTY BAGS" and TOSS them off the left side of the screen
  • Tossing BOOTY BAGS = GOOD
  • Tossing BOOTY BARRELS = BAD
  • COMPETE FOR THE HIGH-SCORE ON THE LEADERBOARDS

(Get a "C" grade or higher to unlock the BONUS STAGE)

KNOWN ISSUES/BUGS:

  • Sometimes you'll grab 2 or more BOOTIES at once and they stick together.  If you click and re-click it should resolve the issue. Probably. 
  • COMBOs are for fun and not adding multipliers to your score because MATH IS HARD. 
  • Music/Sound doesn't work correctly on most mobile devices.
  • TITLE SCREEN text is displayed incorrectly on mobile devices and certain browsers.  

CREDITS:

  • Art Credit: Pixel Frog Assets  (alteration to sprites and added assets) CC BY 4.0
